children.name: gapped
children.prompt: Make gapped alignment of ungapped-MSP contigs (-G)

format.python: ( ""  , " -l "+str(value) )[ value is not None  and value !=vdef]

children.name: old_cutoff
children.prompt: Use old step cutoffs for adjacency instead of the new continuous system. (-O)

children.name: threshold_id
children.prompt: Reject all matches with less than this % identity (-I)

children.name: threshold_length
children.prompt: Reject all matches with length less than this value (-L)

children.name: expect
children.prompt: Reject all matches with E-value higher than this value (-e)

children.name: query
children.prompt: Read in query seq (for rereading .seqbl files) (-Q)

children.name: whole_contig
children.prompt: Coverage limitation requires whole contig to be covered (always for Blastp) (-a)

children.name: no_hits_to_earlier
children.prompt: Ignore hits to earlier seqnames (for All-vs-All) (-A)

children.name: stats_without_X
children.prompt: Recalculate percentage identity, ignoring X residues. (-j)

children.name: stats_without_end
children.prompt: Recalculate percentage identity, ignoring mismatches at ends. (-J)

children.name: silent_mutations
children.prompt: Do Statistics of Silent mutations (only cDNA!) (-S)

children.name: all_expected
children.prompt: Print all Expected scores (default only when positive) (-X)

children.name: matches_one_line
children.prompt: For Big Picture output, force all matches to the same subject on one line (-F)

children.name: wublast_numbered
children.prompt: Indicate query insertions with numbers (For seqbl output from Wublast) (-N)

children.name: dont_mirror
children.prompt: Don't mirror (i.e. print the subject object) in ACE4 format (-M)

children.name: exbldb
children.prompt: Produce exbldb output (as exblx with query names) (-d)

children.name: footer
children.prompt: Print footer with parameters and stats (-f)
